explanations.reason: The paper focuses on a longitudinal multilevel population-based study analyzing the risk of readmission among HIV patients in Portuguese hospitals. It uses logistic regression and random effects models to identify determinants of 30-day hospital readmission. The study does not involve any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies mentioned in the provided keywords list. The analysis is purely statistical and epidemiological in nature, without any application of advanced computational or AI-based methods.
